text: Kenbyōin-mae is a Hiroden station (tram stop) on Hiroden Ujina Line, located in Minami-ku, Hiroshima. ==Routes== From Kenbyōin-mae Station, there are three of Hiroden Streetcar routes. *25px Hiroshima Station - Hiroshima Port Route *25px Hiroden-nishi-hiroshima - Hiroshima Port Route *25px Hiroshima Station - (via Hijiyama-shita) - Hiroshima Port Route ==Connections== ;█ Ujina Line :25px 25px 25px ::Hirodaifuzokugakkō-mae — Kenbyōin-mae — Ujina 2-chōme ==Around station== *Hiroshima Prefectural Hospital *Prefectural University of Hiroshima *Ujina Post Office *JUSCO Miyuki ==History== *Opened as "Koryo- chugaku-mae" on November 27, 1935. *Renamed to the present name "Kenbyoin-mae" in 1948. ==See also== *Hiroden Streetcar Lines and Routes *List of railway stations in Japan ==External links== Kenbyoin-mae Station Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1935
